00016 // Inherit from this to get threading.  The usage is:
00017 //     threaded.start()
00018 //     threaded.join()
00019 // Implement the run() function as the thread.
00020 class Threaded {
00021     public:
00022         Threaded();
00023         ~Threaded();
00024         virtual void start();
00025         virtual void stop();
00026         void join();
00027         bool running();
00028     protected:
00029         volatile bool stopRequested;
00030     private:
00031         void startRun();
00032         virtual void run() = 0;
00033         volatile bool _running;
00034         boost::thread * runThread;
00035         //boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> runThread; 
00036         boost::mutex startup_mutex;
00037         boost::condition startup_condition;
00038 };

00042 struct window_request{
00043     boost::condition c;
00044     std::string window_name;
00045     myro_img* img;
00046 };

00048 class DisplayMan : public Threaded{
00049     public:
00050         DisplayMan();
00051         ~DisplayMan();
00052         virtual void run();
00053         // To be called by users
00054         void set_picture_window(myro_img& img, const char* window_name);
00055         void block_on(const char* window_name);
00056     private:
00057         CImg_display* get_winobj(const char* window_name);
00058         // To be called by the run() thread
00059         CImg_display* myset_picture_window(myro_img& img, const char* window_name);
00060         //void mynonblock_display_window(const char* window_name);
00061     private:
00062         myro_cimg_display_map display_map;
00063         boost::mutex mutex;
00064         std::queue<window_request*> requests;
00065 
00066         friend class GraphWin;
00067 };
